title: [Large-Scale] Development of Mathematics Teaching Methodologies Using Design Thinking and Human-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and General Understanding of Teaching Methodologies
context.additional_context: Emphasizing activities feasible in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on experiential learning and collaboration

learning_goals: They can systematically design mathematical problem-solving activities by applying the design thinking process
They can develop at least three elementary mathematics education scenarios utilizing a learner-centered approach
They can create and apply at least two mathematics assessment tools reflecting human-centered design principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
